description: Node Overview dashboard helps visualise multiple nodes in multiple clusters and their metrics with a focus on resources in the nodes.

panels.description: Build version of Aerospike Server running on this node
panels.title: Aerospike Version

panels.description: Displays total of all alerts by severity ( critical, error, warn and info) across all the selected node and namespaces

targets.expr: count by (severity) (ALERTS{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^", severity=~"warn|critical|info|error"})

panels.title: Alerts

panels.description:
Node failed best practice check, best practice check can be verified using below command in aerospike tools :

asadm show best-practice
panels.title: Best Practice

panels.description: Aerospike server running status on this node
panels.title: Status

panels.description:
Displays sum of namespace stop_writes, clock skew stop writes and high water mark breached flags across all the nodes in selected cluster, a positive value means some issue with resource utilization or configurations

More details about these metrics in below links
STOP_WRITES , CLOCK_SKEW_STOP_WRITES , HWM_BREACHED
panels.title: Stop Writes / HWM Breached (total)

panels.description:
Displays sum of partitions Remaining and Active which are Received or Transmitted across selected cluster for the selected nodes and namespaces

More details about the key metrics displayed can be found in below links
RX_PARTITIONS_REMAINING , RX_PARTITIONS_ACTIVE , TX_PARTITIONS_REMAINING TX_PARTITIONS_ACTIVE ,

targets.expr:
sum (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})

# topk( 3, sum by (service) (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_remaining{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))

sum (aerospike_namespace_migrate_rx_partitions_active{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})

# topk( 3, sum by (service) (aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))

sum (aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})

# topk( 3, sum by (service) (aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))

sum (aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_active{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})

# topk( 3, sum by (service) (aerospike_namespace_migrate_tx_partitions_remaining{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}))

panels.title: Migrations (total)

panels.description: Displays sum of all device or memory used by data (without index) and the sum of allocated bytes

targets.expr:
sum(aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} or aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}
)

panels.title: Data (bytes) (total)

panels.description: Displays sum of all device or memory used by index, sindex and set-index
panels.title: Index used (bytes) (total)

panels.description:
Flash Alloc Bytes - Total bytes allocated on the mount(s) for the primary index used by this namespace on this node. This statistic represents entire 4KiB chunks which have at least one element in use.


Flash Alloc Percent - Percentage of the mount(s) allocated for the primary index used by this namespace on this node. Calculated as (index_flash_alloc_bytes / index-type.mounts-size-limit) * 100. This statistic represents entire 4KiB chunks which have at least one element in use.
panels.title: Index (Flash) alloc (bytes) (total)

panels.description:
Total of records in the namespace across all the selected nodes

More details can be found about the key metrics/confings using below links
MASTER OBJECTS ,
panels.title: Master Objects (total)

panels.description: Displays minimum, average and maximum of all device or memory used by data (without index) across all namespaces

targets.expr:
min(aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} or 
aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})

avg(aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} or 
aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})

max(aerospike_namespace_device_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} or 
aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})

panels.title: Data used (bytes)

panels.description: Displays minimum , average  and maximum  device or memory used % by data (without index)

targets.expr:
min( (100-aerospike_namespace_pmem_free_pct{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ) or (100-aerospike_namespace_device_free_pct{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} )
)

avg( (100-aerospike_namespace_pmem_free_pct{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ) or (100-aerospike_namespace_device_free_pct{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} )
)

avg( (100-aerospike_namespace_pmem_free_pct{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ) or (100-aerospike_namespace_device_free_pct{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} )
)

panels.title: % Data used

panels.description: Displays minimum, average and maximum device or memory used by index, sindex and set-index across all namespaces
panels.title: Index used (bytes)

panels.description:
Flash Alloc Bytes - Total bytes allocated on the mount(s) for the primary index used by this namespace on this node. This statistic represents entire 4KiB chunks which have at least one element in use.


Flash Alloc Percent - Percentage of the mount(s) allocated for the primary index used by this namespace on this node. Calculated as (index_flash_alloc_bytes / index-type.mounts-size-limit) * 100. This statistic represents entire 4KiB chunks which have at least one element in use.
panels.title: Index (Flash) alloc (bytes)

panels.description:
Displays Minimum, Average and Maximum records in the namespace across all the selected nodes

More details can be found about the key metrics/confings using below links
MASTER OBJECTS ,
panels.title: Master Objects

panels.description:
Display Quota usage of top 3 SET's in selected namespace against "stop write size" configuration defined for the set 
6.x Formula: ((memory_data_bytes + device_data_bytes)/ stop_writes_size)*100 
OR
((data_used_bytes)/ stop_writes_size)*100

More details can be found key metrics and configs using below links
MEMORY_DATA_BYTES , DEVICE_DATA_BYTES , STOP_WRITES_SIZE , DATA_USED_BYTES ,

targets.expr:
topk(3,sort_desc((
  (aerospike_sets_memory_data_bytes{job="$job_name",cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}+aerospike_sets_device_data_bytes{job="$job_name",cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"})
  /(aerospike_sets_stop_writes_size{job="$job_name",cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}!=0) )*100))

panels.title: % Set Quota used (topk)

panels.description:
Displays sum of storage memory used by data (without index) across all the namespaces, 
NOTE: this panel is deprecated from 7.0 onwards as this metric is merged into common data metrics

targets.expr: sum(aerospike_namespace_memory_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} unless (aerospike_namespace_device_total_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} or aerospike_namespace_pmem_used_bytes{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"} ) )

panels.title: 6.x Data (Memory) (deprecated) (bytes) (total)

panels.description:
Total Client/Heartbeat/Fabric connections count across all the selected nodes

More details about the key metrics / configs can be found using below links
CLIENT CONNECTIONS , HEARTBEAT CONNECTIONS , FABRIC CONNECTIONS ,
panels.title: Connections (total)

panels.description:
Displays minimuim, average and maximum memory available for storage across all the namespaces, 
NOTE: this panel is deprecated from 7.0 onwards as this metric is merged into common data metrics
panels.title: 6.x % Memory free (deprecated)

panels.description: Client connections, fabric connections and heartbeat connections
panels.title: Connections

panels.description: Percentage of storage available for further use
panels.title: % Data (topk)

panels.description: Rate of client, heartbeat and fabric connections opened or closed
panels.title: Connections Opened / Closed (rate)

panels.description: Reads per second
panels.title: Latency: Reads / sec (max)

panels.description:
Shows per-second average rate of increase in

1. Total writes = client_write_success + client_write_error + client_write_timeout + batch_sub_write_success + batch_sub_write_error + batch_sub_write_timeout
2. Successful writes = client_write_success + batch_sub_write_success
3. Errored writes = client_write_error + batch_sub_write_error
4. Timedout writes = client_write_timeout + batch_sub_write_timeout

targets.expr: sum by (job, cluster_name, service) (rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_success{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval])+rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval])+rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_write_success{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_write_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_write_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_name, service) (rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_success{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_write_success{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_name, service) (rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_write_timeout{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (job, cluster_name, service) (rate(aerospike_namespace_client_write_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(aerospike_namespace_batch_sub_write_error{job="$job_name", cluster_name=~"$cluster", service=~"$node|$^", ns=~"$namespace|$^"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Client Writes (TPS) (rate) (total)

panels.description: Writes per second
panels.title: Latency: Writes / sec (max)

panels.description: % of quota used by each set by a namespace within this node
panels.title: % Set Quota used by Namespace

panels.description: Secondary index queries per second
panels.title: Latency: Sindex Query / sec (max)

panels.description: Master objects, prole objects and tombstones
panels.title: Objects

panels.description: UDF transactions per second
panels.title: Latency: UDF / sec (max)

panels.description: Migrations remaining migrate_tx_partitions_remaining (transmit), migrate_rx_partitions_remaining (receive)
panels.title: Migrations (Partitions)

panels.description: Primary index queries per second
panels.title: Latency: Pindex Query / sec (max)

panels.description:
Number of detached server threads currently running.

Number of joinable server threads currently running.

Number of currently active threads in the server thread pool.

Total number of threads in the server thread pool.
panels.title: Threads

panels.description: Proxies per second
panels.title: Latency: Proxies / sec (max)

title: Node Overview
